references.reason: This paper introduces the Segment Anything Model (SAM), a powerful and versatile image segmentation model used as a core component of the GaussianProperty framework.
This foundational work demonstrates the few-shot learning capabilities of large language models, which are crucial to the physical property recognition aspect of GaussianProperty.
This documentation details GPT-4V, the large multimodal model employed by GaussianProperty for its robust image understanding and reasoning abilities.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian Splatting for Real-Time Radiance Field Rendering
references.reason: This work details the 3D Gaussian splatting technique which provides the 3D representation to which physical properties are assigned in GaussianProperty.

references.paper_title: PhysGaussian: Physics-integrated 3D Gaussians for Generative Dynamics
references.reason: This paper introduces PhysGaussian, the dynamic simulation framework extended by GaussianProperty to incorporate the predicted physical properties.
